items.title: STARTING
items.description: As the game consist simple controls and a touch arduous gameplay, therefore its crucial for the garners to use a lot of tips and tricks in it. The subsequent are some vital tips and tricks concerning all users should understand. You have to get a lot of coins : It means users have to be compelled to earn more and more coins. The simple and straightforward thanks to earn coins is by reading a lot of numbers of stories and chapters within the game. You have to earn ressources : The ressources are earned by finishing a lot of chapters and by reading more stories. One ought to earn enough keys by applying the scary Teacher 3D cheats.

items.title: WHERE IS THE AND HOW DO YOU
items.description: WHERE IS THE AND HOW DO YOU.. ?Where is the teachers dress on the 4th level? Second floor go to first door at your left. Where is the stink bomb? If you go to the base of the stairs by the front entrance and walk along the bottom of them on the floor, there's a door at the back of them. the bombe is down there. When you come back up, the door across from you is the kitchen. You will go there to get out to the sauna, but she's probably in it. How do you drop the stink bomb? When you climb on top of the sauna but the latter behind there is a gap point on the marker on your screen through the gap and press the button you use to open doors, pick up stuff! Where is the cat? I can't find it The cat is in one of the cupboards upstairs

items.title: SOME TIPS
items.description: Some tips : The problem within the replay : If you are enjoying scary teacher 3D then you can't replay the chapters. So as to look at your favorite character, one should begin it from the start. Move between stories : Some gamers are unengaged to move between the stories. One will begin the stories from they leave. Users will begin the story while not losing the progress you created. By applying tips and tricks, you can be one of the best players of the game. Don't forget to collect coins!

items.title: IMPORTANCE OF CURRENCY IN THE GAME
items.description: Importance of currency in the game Users need to provide a nice look to their characters a lot of money. You can unlock a lot of it in the stories and win coins. You can also link the game with your facebook account. Coins earned by work within the game, otherwise you will say that by connecting the sport with facebook You can also invite your friends via facebook : You can invite your friend to play the game with you and you can earn a lot of coins for each friend that open the game with the invitation you've sent to him

items.title: Where is the and How do you
items.description: Where is the and How do you... ? Where is the cat? I can't find it The cat is in one of the cupboards upstairs How can you lock her in the sauna? At the door of the sauna there is a piece of wood attached. click on it and it will slide down to lock her in. How do you open the front? Easiest way is the lockpick in the room at the side of the house. If its a green key, there is one under the matt outside the front door ( red one )
